|lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=DSL (ADSL2+) AFE;Conexant;BAZ-3882-NCAZ;BAZ-3882-NCAZ, 1003 SGP, D4KQ7.1.3;1; |flags= |stock_boot=PP Boot;v1.5; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.11.12; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NETGEAR-3G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR-3G$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:22:3F,00:24:B2,C0:3F:0E |oui_eth=00:22:3F,00:24:B2,C0:3F:0E }} {{TagLine|3G Broadband Wireless Router}}
{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=MBR624GU|vs_id=2643}} : [http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GPL/MBR624GU-6.0.1.30.64-gpl.zip GPL Source to firmware version 6.01.30.64WW] The RF chip may be a CX50221 or CX50321. Manuf. by Foxconn / Hon Hai / Ambit, model U12L060T12. ==Images== File:Netgear MBR624GU front.jpg|front File:Netgear MBR624GU button side.jpg|button side File:Netgear MBR624GU non button side.jpg|non-button side File:Netgear MBR624GU bottom.jpg|bottom File:Netgear MBR624GU back.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] File:Netgear MBR624GU board top.jpg|board top File:Netgear MBR624GU Conexant CX94610.jpg|CX94610 CPU File:Netgear MBR624GU BAZ-3882-NCAZ.jpg|BAZ-3882-NCAZ File:Netgear MBR624GU board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Netgear MBR624GU Flash.jpg|Flash File:Netgear MBR624GU RAM.jpg|RAM [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout===
